attributes.action: allow us to decide for ourselves about the EU treaty, give us our referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a democracy and the democratic way is to allow the UK citizens a vote for themselves to decide on the EU treaty, we want to be able to say for ourselves what is good for us, not to be told what is good for us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
